official_title: A bill to amend title 3 of the United States Code to authorize the Secretary of State to provide protection for foreign diplomats in the United States in extraordinary circumstances.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of State, upon the request of any State or local government, to provide protection for foreign diplomats in extraordinary circumstances.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 3 of the United States Code to authorize the Secretary of State to provide protection for foreign diplomats in the United States in extraordinary circumstances.
